MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 18-APR-2021 15:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the KA26 postcode area of Girvan. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm to safely carry out repairs to a broken overhead line equipment near Balshaloch farm  and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:53am on Sunday, 18 April 2021
